remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，你创建时有多个为同一类型的对象，并且您想要提供您自己逻辑来选择将基于每个数据对象的属性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意，如果有不同的对象类型，你可以设置属性。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果执行此操作，则无需创建。If you do that then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果你有相同类型的但具有不同的属性的对象，还可以考虑使用或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要创建一个模板选择器，创建一个类继承自，并重写方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 定义类后你可以将类的实例分配给您的元素的模板选择器属性。Once your class is defined you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. ## Examples 在此示例中，绑定源是一份`Task`对象。In this example, the binding source is a list of `Task` objects. 属性之一`Task`对象是`Priority`。One of the properties of a `Task` object is `Priority`. 有两个数据模板，定义，`myTaskTemplate`和`importantTaskTemplate`。There are two data templates defined, `myTaskTemplate` and `importantTaskTemplate`. 若要提供逻辑选择哪个使用基于`Priority`值的数据对象，创建一个子类，并重写方法。To supply logic to choose which to use based on the `Priority` value of the data object, create a subclass of and override the method. 在下面的示例中，方法提供逻辑来返回适当的模板的值基于`Priority`属性。In the following example, the method provides logic to return the appropriate template based on the value of the `Priority` property. 要返回的模板文件位于封装的资源元素。The template to return is found in the resources of the enveloping element.
